DOC.brief_summary: The objective clinical study evaluate clinical utility WEB Aneurysm Embolization System use embolize intracranial aneurysm
DOC.brief_title: WEB Clinical Assessment IntraSaccular Aneurysm Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: The following parameter evaluate part study : - Aneurysm morphology - Aneurysm size - For ruptured aneurysm : Hunt Hess Classification Subarachnoid Hemorrhage ( SAH ) - Size embolization device ( ) use procedure - Intra-procedural assessment aneurysm occlusion flow stasis - Degree aneurysm occlusion post-procedure ( percentage occlusion , Raymond Scale score appropriate ) - Aneurysm occlusion durability - Recanalization rate - Device-related change Modified Rankin Scale baseline - Complications/adverse event - Rebleed/new bleed
DOC.criteria: Must least 18 year age Must sign date IRB/ECapproved write informed consent prior initiation study procedure Must clinical angiographic evidence vasospasm Must lesion characteristic unsuitable endovascular treatment Must neurologic psychiatric condition , preclude ability comply aspect screen , evaluation , treatment , postprocedure followup schedule Must concurrently involve another investigational postmarket study Must receive investigational device treatment target intracranial aneurysm prior entry trial
